# North Brisbane & Moreton Bay Education Guide

A trusted, impartial resource for parents seeking information about schools, NAPLAN, and tutoring in North Brisbane and Moreton Bay.

## Features
- Jekyll-powered static site
- No analytics, ads, or tracking
- Privacy-friendly local search
- Responsive, accessible design
- Neutral, non-commercial content

## Local Development
1. Install Ruby and Jekyll
2. Clone this repository
3. Run `jekyll serve --livereload`
4. Visit `http://127.0.0.1:4000`

## Contributing
This project is not open for public contributions. For feedback or accessibility issues, contact info@northbrisbaneeducationguide.com.au.

## License
Content is provided for general guidance only. See site for details.
